channel.title: The Joy of Techs: London's sexy new IT crowd
channel.description: I thought you would all enjoy this wonderful piece of writing http://www.standard.co.uk/lifestyle/esmagazine/the-joy-of-techs-londons-sexy-new-it-crowd-9626538.html

item.title: The Joy of Techs: London's sexy new IT crowd
item.dc:creator: gravelld
item.description:
I go back to London (having left last year) for meet ups and things, last one was at Shoreditch. Upon exiting Old Street station I couldn’t stop smiling - it was chock full of “self-facilitating media nodes”.

Read full topic
item.source: The Joy of Techs: London's sexy new IT crowd

item.title: The Joy of Techs: London's sexy new IT crowd
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Oh man, and here I thought I could move to the UK to escape this stuff! Bah.
